name: azure_fbig_publish
description: Uploads a zip file as an application asset to Facebook's Instant Games service.
author: Strange Secrets

inputs.name: applicationId
inputs.label: Application ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Application identifier the artifact will be uploaded to.

inputs.name: accessToken
inputs.label: Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Access token to the application, allowing assets to be uploaded.

inputs.name: fileName
inputs.label: Package File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The zip file to be uploaded.
